wikipedia_page.main:
Sir Andrew John Cash  (born 14 October 1955) was Chief Executive of Sheffield Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust. He retired from the role early 2019.
He was educated at Bristol Grammar School, the University of East Anglia (BA, Economic and Social History) and the University of Leeds.Cash was appointed an Officer of the British Empire (OBE) in the 2001 New Year Honours.He was knighted in the 2009 Birthday Honours.In 2015 the Health Service Journal judged him as the second to top Chief Executive in the National Health Service.

response: * Andrew John Cash, , Chief Executive, Sheffield Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust. For services to Healthcare.
